places.name: The Bronze
places.description: A popular nightclub for Sunnydale teens, and a frequent hangout spot for the Scooby Gang. The Bronze also hosts live performances by musical guests and is often the site of supernatural incidents.

places.name: Sunnydale High School
places.description: The high school attended by Buffy and her friends, and a focal point of many supernatural occurrences in Sunnydale. It was built on top of a Hellmouth, making it a hotbed of supernatural activity.

places.name: Watcher's Council Headquarters
places.description: The headquarters of the Watcher's Council, an organization dedicated to training and supporting Watchers and Slayers in their fight against evil. The Council has a vast library of occult knowledge and resources at their disposal.

places.name: Wolfram & Hart
places.description: A powerful law firm that represents demons and other supernatural beings. Wolfram & Hart is also involved in numerous illicit activities, and is a major player in the supernatural world.

places.name: The Hyperion Hotel
places.description: A historic hotel in Los Angeles that was used as the headquarters for Angel Investigations. The Hyperion also served as a sanctuary for a variety of supernatural beings, and was frequently the site of battles between good and evil.

places.name: Buffy's House
places.description: Buffy's house is a two-story suburban house located in Sunnydale. It has a front yard and a backyard, and a spacious interior with multiple rooms. Buffy lives here with her mother Joyce until her death in season five, after which she shares the house with her sister Dawn.
notable_events: The Scooby Gang frequently meets here to discuss their plans for battling evil in Sunnydale
Angel loses his soul and becomes Angelus in Buffy's bedroom
Joyce Summers dies of a brain aneurysm in the living room
Dawn is revealed to be the Key in the living room

places.name: Magic Box
places.description: The Magic Box is a magic shop in Sunnydale owned by Rupert Giles. It is a popular location for the Scooby Gang to purchase magical supplies and weapons, as well as a place for them to research information on demons and other supernatural entities. The shop is also frequently targeted by demons and other evil beings.
notable_events: The Scooby Gang purchases magical supplies and weapons from the Magic Box
Dawn and Spike attempt to rob the Magic Box for money and magical artifacts
Willow casts a spell to make everyone in the Magic Box forget who they are, causing chaos

places.name: Sunnydale High School Library
places.description: The Sunnydale High School Library is a central location for the Scooby Gang to conduct research and investigate supernatural occurrences. It is managed by Rupert Giles, who serves as the school's librarian.
notable_events: The Scooby Gang researches and discovers the existence of the Hellmouth in the library
Buffy fights the Master and is killed in the library
The library is destroyed by the mayor during the battle for Sunnydale

places.name: Sunnydale Graveyard
places.description: The Sunnydale Graveyard is a location where many supernatural events take place. It is a common location for vampires to rise from their graves, and a frequent site of battles between the Scooby Gang and various supernatural foes.
notable_events: Buffy and Angel fight in the graveyard
The Master performs a ritual to open the Hellmouth in the graveyard
Buffy and her friends battle a group of demons in the graveyard
